    • Uses of ShipDirection in model

      Methods in model with parameters of type ShipDirection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Ship.enoughSpace(int x, int y, ShipDirection direction, boolean[][] shipsGrid)
      A method for checking if there is enough space on the grid for the Ship which being set.
      void Computer.lineCheck(Coordinates lastHit, Coordinates lastSuccessfulHit, ShipDirection direction)
      Given two couples of aligned Coordinates, the Computer chooses at most two other cells, aligned to the parameters, to be aimed to in its next hits.
      void BattleshipModel.playerSetsShip(int shipIndex, int row, int col, ShipDirection direction)
      Place one of the available Player's Ships on its ships grid.
      void Player.setShip(int shipIndex, int row, int col, ShipDirection direction)
      Sets a single Player's Ship onto the Player's game grid.
      boolean Ship.setShip(int x, int y, ShipDirection direction, boolean[][] shipsGrid)
      A method for assigning an absolute position to a Ship object and then positioning it onto a Player's ships grid.
